metadata.title: CVE-2021-46828 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In libtirpc before 1.3.3rc1, remote attackers could exhaust the file descriptors of a process that uses libtirpc because idle TCP connections are mishandled. This can, in turn, lead to an svc_run infinite loop without accepting new connections.

notes.note: amurray> ntirpc is forked from libtirpc so shares a lot of code

criterions.comment: libtirpc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
ntirpc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
